name: Wisel Guard 3
text: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by Tributing 1 "Wisel Guard". If there is no face-up "Meklord Emperor" on the field, destroy this card. When an opponent's monster declares an attack that targets another monster you control: You can change the attack target to this card. The first time this card would be destroyed by battle each turn, it is not destroyed.
